Actionlog¶

messagelogconfig¶

Set the modlog channel for a server by passing the channel id

`{prefix}messagelogconfig #orwellian-dystopia` - set a channel named #orwellian-dystopia to log message edits/deletions

memberlogconfig¶

Command group to configure Join/Leave logs

`{prefix}memberlogconfig setchannel channel`: Sets the member log channel

{prefix}memberlogconfig toggleping: Toggles whenever members are pinged upon joining the guild {prefix}memberlogconfig setjoinmessage template: Sets join template {prefix}memberlogconfig setleavemessage template: Sets leave template {prefix}memberlogconfig help: Returns the template formatting key help ++++ Displays message formatting key

setjoinmessage¶

Configure custom join message template

setleavemessage¶

Configure custom leave message template

setchannel¶

Configure join/leave channel

disable¶

Disables Join/Leave logging

toggleping¶

Toggles whenever a new member gets pinged on join
